PerformanceObserverEntryList.summary: The PerformanceObserverEntryList interface is a list of that were explicitly observed via the method.

PerformanceObserverEntryListGetEntries.summary: The getEntries() method of the interface returns a list of explicitly observed objects. The list's members are determined by the set of specified in the call to the method. The list is available in the observer's callback function (as the first parameter in the callback).
PerformanceObserverEntryListGetEntries.returns: A list of explicitly observed objects. The items will be in chronological order based on the entries' . If no objects are found, an empty list is returned.

PerformanceObserverEntryListGetEntriesBy.summary: The getEntriesByName() method of the interface returns a list of explicitly observed objects for a given and . The list's members are determined by the set of specified in the call to the method. The list is available in the observer's callback function (as the first parameter in the callback).
PerformanceObserverEntryListGetEntriesBy.returns: A list of explicitly observed objects that have the specified name and type. If the type argument is not specified, only the name will be used to determine the entries to return. The items will be in chronological order based on the entries' . If no objects meet the specified criteria, an empty list is returned.

PerformanceObserverEntryListGetEntriesBy.summary: The getEntriesByType() method of the returns a list of explicitly observed objects for a given . The list's members are determined by the set of specified in the call to the method. The list is available in the observer's callback function (as the first parameter in the callback).
PerformanceObserverEntryListGetEntriesBy.returns: A list of explicitly observed objects that have the specified type. The items will be in chronological order based on the entries' . If no objects have the specified type, or no argument is provided, an empty list is returned.
